meaningMnemonic: In a <radical>coffin</radical> is someone <radical>begging</radical>. But, it won't work. You won't listen. So, the man in the coffin just begins to <kanji>think</kanji>: What could I have done better in my life? Why am I in this situation? How will I get out? Think, damnit, think!!
readingMnemonic: What is the beggar <kanji>think</kanji>ing of? A thought bubble pops up into existence near his head. In it is a picture of <reading>こう</reading>いち! He's thinking that if こういち was here, he'd save him. Oh, if only こういち could save us all!
